rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0001
rows.name: Yes[ST:wide ]— I finally feel like admitting it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0002
rows.name: I was indeed frightened of you Earthlings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0003
rows.name:
In the era of the universe's creation,
the people of Samaar who came from another world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0004
rows.name: We Growth can never go against them[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0005
rows.name:
If we oppose them, we perish.
I thought it was just a myth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0006
rows.name:
But they say the descendants of Samaar
are still surviving even now[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0008
rows.name:
Even if you are the descendants of Samaar,
right now you are nothing more than primitive savages![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070180_MSG0009
rows.name:
There is no reason for us to obey!
No justification to be afraid![ST:wait ]
